title: Immunefi Bug Bounty Program Participation - Motion
body:
It is hereby motioned to participate in the upcoming Immunefi Bug Bounty Program and allocate 100,000 DAI from the Asset Management subDAO towards this opportunity. 

The program will be run and managed by Immunefi according to mStable’s existing program rules, policies, and technical team.

Should this motion pass, Immunefi will post an official summary and proposal on the mStable forum for further discussion points and more detailed information around the program itself.

**Should this motion be brought forward and shared as a public proposal on the mStable forum and Snapshot page?**
author: 0x908DB31Ce01DC42c8B712f9156E969bc65023119
